short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Installs a context menu item to translate selected text using Yandex Translate service.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Select any text on the page, open context menu and click "Translate with Yandex" button.
A new tab will be opened with the selected text translated
